answers.answer: Welcome to the gastroenterology community!  Whether or not you have diabetes doesn't affect the gastroparesis diet (diabetics just have additional rules they need to follow for their diet).  You need to eat a low-fiber, low-fat diet and eat small frequent meals.  Other people find that certain foods make their gastroparesis worse but this is just trial-and error.

question: what foods should i avoid i have gastropresis and i do not have diabetes
title: i have gastropresis but i do not have diabetes what foods should i avoid
